sentences.english: They photographed the entire course of a snake falling victim to a weasel.
sentences.chinese: 他們拍攝下一條蛇被一隻黃鼬捕食的全過程。

sentences.english: The weasel skin with dry water stains in Hatch No. 5 gives off a horrible smell.
sentences.chinese: 五艙帶幹水漬的黃鼬皮發出難聞的氣味。

sentences.english: Objective To research on rat-control capabilities of the yellow weasel.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黃鼬控制害鼠的能力。
